mapper.select: SELECT category FROM product_category_tb ORDER BY idx_product_category
SELECT client_name FROM client_tb WHERE client_type = '발주처' ORDER BY client_name
SELECT idx_purchase_order FROM purchase_order_tb ORDER BY idx_purchase_order DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT de_name FROM department_tb dt JOIN employee_tb et ON dt.idx_department = et.idx_department WHERE et.idx_employee = #{param1}
SELECT tt.title_name FROM title_tb tt JOIN employee_tb et ON tt.idx_title = et.idx_title WHERE et.idx_employee = #{param1}

SELECT ct.client_name FROM product_tb pt JOIN client_tb ct ON ct.idx_business = pt.idx_business JOIN product_category_tb pct ON pct.idx_product_category = pt.idx_product_category JOIN inventory_tb it ON it.idx_product = pt.idx_product WHERE it.current_stock < pt.minimum_stock

SELECT it.idx_product , pt.product_name , ct.client_name , it.current_stock , pt.minimum_stock FROM product_tb pt join client_tb ct on ct.idx_business = pt.idx_business join product_category_tb pct on pct.idx_product_category = pt.idx_product_category join inventory_tb it on it.idx_product = pt.idx_product WHERE it.current_stock < pt.minimum_stock AND ct.client_name = #{param1}
